abstract.t: This draft specifies procedures for backward compatibility of the (PBB-)EVPN solution with (PBB-)VPLS and provides mechanisms for seamless integration of the two technologies in the same MPLS/IP network on a per-VPN-instance basis. Implementation of this draft enables service providers to introduce (PBB-)EVPN PEs in their brown- field deployments of (PBB-)VPLS networks.
